trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: Espone metodi e propriet√† per supportare l'accesso client di automazione interfaccia utente ai controlli che possono scorrere un insieme di stati e gestire che uno stato impostato.

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Implementato su un provider di automazione interfaccia utente che deve supportare il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>pattern di controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of a control.
trans-unit.target: Scorre gli stati di attivazione/disattivazione di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its toggle states in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo deve scorrere i relativi stati di attivazione/disattivazione in questo ordine: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e (se supportato) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the toggle state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato di attivazione/disattivazione del controllo.

trans-unit.source: A control must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, and (if supported) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo deve scorrere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>in questo ordine: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e (se supportato) <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>
